name: Party Smasher
description:
Party Smasher
Warning!

This might be the ugliest game you have ever played.

There's another party going on. But the kids are going too far! Hit them with their disco ball.
Party Smasher is a little funny HTML 5 game made for the Newgrounds Construct 2 Touch Jam.
Clicking/ touching screen let the disco ball fall.

Music
Mining by Moonlight by Kevin McLeod
incompetech.com

Sound Effects
freesfx.co.uk

Programming/ Design/ Artwork
